about_the_game:
Marias Pass, the legendary rail crossing of America’s Continental Divide and the Montana Rockies, was built by the famed Great Northern Railway and today is one of giant the BNSF Railway’s busiest, toughest, and most scenic main lines.

Now, Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01, from accomplished developer High Iron Simulations, brings dynamic and contemporary BNSF and Amtrak railroading to the popular Train Simulator Marias Pass route with ten new and authentic career scenarios.

With Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01, you’ll experience realistic and challenging intermodal, freight, unit-train, passenger, local, and switching operations, and you’ll take the throttle of six types of modern diesel locomotives to battle heavy tonnage and daunting mountain grades.

Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01 features the challenges of operating some of the longest and heaviest trains in America. With Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01, you’ll experience:

  • Handling massive freights and unit trains, equipped with head-end power and DPUs at mid-train and on the rear, to lift the tonnage over the daunting grades of Marias Pass.
  • Climbing the scenic and rugged west slope of the Montana Rockies, from Whitefish, Montana to famed Marias Summit, with a heavy auto rack (vehicles) train.
  • Grinding up the long east slope of the pass, from the high plains at Shelby, Montana to the 5,215-foot-high summit of Marias Pass, with a ponderous grain train bound from the North Dakota plains to Pacific Northwest ports.
  • Taking the throttle of an Amtrak 50th Anniversary-liveried GE P42DC to usher the Superliner-equipped Empire Builder up and over Marias Pass on a winter morning.
  • With the help of diesels placed on the head-end, mid-train, and rear, carefully easing an ultra-heavy unit train of crude oil down the steep west slope of Marias Pass.
  • Hustling a BNSF priority intermodal train bound for the Pacific Northwest along the scenic and remote Flathead River.
  • Working challenging switching and local duties at and around the busy railroad towns of Shelby and Cut Bank, Montana.
  • Climbing into the cab and engineer’s seat of BNSF ES44DC, Dash 9-44CW, SD70ACe, SD70MAC, and GP38-2 diesels, as well as Amtrak’s stylish and powerful GE P42DC.
  • Witnessing the constant bustle of this transcontinental rail route that is alive with BNSF, Amtrak, and “run-through” diesel power of other North American railroads.

The ten career scenarios of Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01, based closely on actual railroad operations and train symbols, offers a remarkable and compelling opportunity to experience realistic contemporary American mountain railroading in all its glory.

Note: For full use, this scenario pack requires the Train Simulator Marias Pass: Shelby - Whitefish Route Add-On; BNSF Locomotive Pack Add-On; BNSF Dash 9 Loco Add-On; SD70 V2 Volume 2 Loco Add-On; Amtrak P42DC 50th Anniversary Collector’s Edition.

 The magic, the challenges, and the railroading drama of historic Marias Pass awaits you – with the Train Simulator Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!

Included Scenarios


  • BNSF V-PTSLPC, Pt. 1
  • BNSF V-PTSLPC, Pt. 2
  • BNSF V-PTSLPC, Pt. 3
  • BNSF L-MON8122
  • BNSF G-CSNINB, Pt. 1
  • BNSF G-CSNINB, Pt. 2
  • BNSF U-EPPFTE
  • Amtrak Train 8, The Empire Builder
  • BNSF Shelby Switcher
  • BNSF Z-CHCSSE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2022 User Guide.
